subtitle: Kia Tigers | C
summary: "Career Stats"
---
```{r , echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
d <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/batters_simple.csv")
d <- subset(d, Code == "5129", select = c(-Name, -KName, -Position, -Code))
d <- d[order(-d$Year),]
d$Team <- paste0("[", d$Team, "](/teams/", gsub("[[:space:]]", "", d$Team), ")")
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,0,3,1,1,3,3,1,2), row.names = FALSE, col.names = c("Season","Team","G","PA","HR","OPS","BB%","SO%","ISO","BABIP","wRC+","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T)
```
